hooks.name: format-on-edit
hooks.description: Run clang-format on edited C/C++ files

hooks.name: build-check
hooks.command: if [ -d build ]; then cmake --build build 2>&1 | grep -E '^.*error:' | head -10; elif [ -f Makefile ]; then make 2>&1 | grep -E '^.*error:' | head -10; fi || true

hooks.name: pre-commit-quality-gate
hooks.description: Full quality check before git commits
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then cmake --build build && ctest --test-dir build --output-on-failure; fi
